mapper.select: select imgname, pname, bno, bdate, pay, addr, paying from img i, product p1, member m, pay p2 where p1.pno=p2.pno and m.no=p2.no and p1.pno=i.pno
mapper.insert: insert into cancel(no, pno, pname, bno, bdate, dprice, cno, cdate) values( #{no}, #{pno}, #{pname}, #{bno}, #{bdate}, #{dprice}, #{cno}, now())
